default_template_content:
Dear {name},

Thank you for your interest in our services. We're excited to have {company} join our community!

We'll be in touch soon with more information about how we can help your business grow.

Best regards,
The Team

Hello {name}! üëã

Thank you for your interest in our services. We're excited to have {company} join our community!

We'll be in touch soon with more information.

Best regards! üöÄ

reset_usage_confirm:
Are you sure you want to reset today's message count?

This should only be used for testing purposes.
access_token_placeholder: Enter your WhatsApp Business API access token
whatsapp_setup_instructions:
1. Go to developers.facebook.com and create a WhatsApp Business app
2. Get your access token from the app dashboard
3. Copy your phone number ID from the API setup
4. Enter the credentials above and test the connection
5. Configure rate limits according to your plan
missing_token_phone_id: Please enter both Access Token and Phone Number ID before testing.
error_save_credentials: Failed to save credentials for testing.
whatsapp_settings_saved: WhatsApp Business API settings have been saved successfully.

Are you sure you want to clear all WhatsApp credentials?

This will disable WhatsApp functionality until reconfigured.
whatsapp_credentials_cleared: WhatsApp credentials have been cleared successfully.
missing_token_phone_required: Please enter both Access Token and Phone Number ID.
may_violate_tos: ‚Ä¢ May violate WhatsApp's Terms of Service
high_risk_suspension: ‚Ä¢ High risk of account suspension or ban
opens_whatsapp_web: ‚Ä¢ Opens WhatsApp Web in your browser
manual_click_send: ‚Ä¢ You must manually click 'Send' for each message
requires_logged_in: ‚Ä¢ Requires you to be logged into WhatsApp Web
low_daily_limits: ‚Ä¢ Very low daily limits (30 messages max)
use_business_api: Use WhatsApp Business API instead - it's official,
reliable_compliant: reliable, compliant, and designed for business use.
step_1: 1. You select recipients and compose your message
step_2: 2. CSC-Reach opens WhatsApp Web in your browser for each recipient
step_3: 3. The message is pre-filled in the chat window
step_4: 4. You manually click 'Send' to send each message
step_5: 5. Process repeats for each recipient with delays between
note_logged_in: Note: You must be logged into WhatsApp Web and keep your browser open during the process.
auto_send_warning:
‚ö†Ô∏è Automatic sending uses system automation to press Enter key.
This increases the risk of account suspension significantly!
close_existing_tabs: Close existing WhatsApp Web tabs before opening new ones
close_tabs_recommended:
‚úÖ Recommended: Prevents browser from opening multiple WhatsApp Web tabs.
Especially important on Windows to avoid performance issues.
conservative_limits_help: Conservative limits help avoid detection and account suspension
rate_limit_minute_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests per minute
rate_limit_hour_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests per hour
rate_limit_day_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded: Daily quota reached
rate_limit_max_retries_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded: Maximum retries reached
request_timeout_exceeded: Request timeout exceeded after maximum retries
template_recommendation_improve_delivery: Consider improving message content to increase delivery rates
template_recommendation_improve_content: Enhance message content to improve read rates
template_recommendation_add_cta: Add clear call-to-action to improve response rates
template_recommendation_increase_usage: Consider using this template more frequently to gather better analytics
conservative_limits_help:
Very conservative limits are enforced to reduce account suspension risk.
These limits are much lower than other services for safety.
ack_violate_tos: I understand this may violate WhatsApp's Terms of Service
ack_accept_ban_risk: I accept the risk of account suspension or ban
ack_manual_send: I understand I must manually send each message (unless auto-send is enabled)
ack_business_api_alternative: I acknowledge that WhatsApp Business API is the recommended alternative
ack_full_responsibility: I take full responsibility for any consequences
ack_auto_send_risks: I understand automatic sending significantly increases risks
final_acknowledgment: I have read all warnings and choose to proceed at my own risk
